channel.title: BattleScape 317 Released
channel.description:
BEFORE YOU SAY ANYTHING, THIS IS 100% CREDITS TO PALIDINO76 ON RUNE-SERBER, I JUST RELEASED IT HERE FOR PEOPLE TO HAVE IT.
You just lost the game.
omg hi
This is my old 317.
Server: EDIT: SQL disabled and passwords are loaded from the char files. EDIT2: Did the T2 fix below http://uppit.com/v/uz74pvwv http://www.2shared.com/file/9371243/...17_server.html
Client: EDIT: Disabled cache downloading, included a run.bat EDIT 2: Did the T2 fix below, enabled clipping, and set the ip to your own EDIT 3: Includes cache already setup, just run it. http://uppit.com/v/QE1WFHAA http://www.2shared.com/file/9390178/...e9/client.html
Cache: (this is no longer required to do downloaded) http://www.megaupload.com/?d=20Y2WIF4 http://www.2shared.com/file/9364489/...V1_online.html http://uppit.com/v/L6U7J4P8
Tools Music Packer: Use this to save an mp3 file for use with the client. http://www.2shared.com/file/9363750/...ic_Packer.html
Version Writer: Used to write the current file versions of the mp3 file, sprite archive, etc http://www.2shared.com/file/9363782/...on_Writer.html
Image Packer: Packs images for the cache. http://uppit.com/v/7N3HONLP
T2 Fix: While this doesn't hit the heart of the T2 error, this will prevent you from being logged out or the client crashing. Server edits: Cryption -> getNextKey (replace the old method) [code] public int getNextKey() { return 0; }[/code]
Client edits: ISAACRandomGen - > getNextKey (replace the old method) [code] public int getNextKey() { return 0; } [/code]

item.title: BattleScape 317 Released
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

BEFORE YOU SAY ANYTHING, THIS IS 100% CREDITS TO PALIDINO76 ON RUNE-SERBER, I JUST RELEASED IT HERE FOR PEOPLE TO HAVE IT.

You just lost the game.

omg hi

This is my old 317.

Server:
EDIT: SQL disabled and passwords are loaded from the char files.
EDIT2: Did the T2 fix below
http://uppit.com/v/uz74pvwv
http://www.2shared.com/file/9371243/...17_server.html

Client:
EDIT: Disabled cache downloading, included a run.bat
EDIT 2: Did the T2 fix below, enabled clipping, and set the ip to your own
EDIT 3: Includes cache already setup, just run it.
http://uppit.com/v/QE1WFHAA
http://www.2shared.com/file/9390178/...e9/client.html

Cache:
(this is no longer required to do downloaded)
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=20Y2WIF4
http://www.2shared.com/file/9364489/...V1_online.html
http://uppit.com/v/L6U7J4P8

Tools
Music Packer:
Use this to save an mp3 file for use with the client.
http://www.2shared.com/file/9363750/...ic_Packer.html

Version Writer:
Used to write the current file versions of the mp3 file, sprite archive, etc
http://www.2shared.com/file/9363782/...on_Writer.html

Image Packer:
Packs images for the cache.
http://uppit.com/v/7N3HONLP

T2 Fix:
While this doesn’t hit the heart of the T2 error, this will prevent you from being logged out or the client crashing.
Server edits:
Cryption -> getNextKey (replace the old method)

public int getNextKey() { return 0; }

Client edits:
ISAACRandomGen - > getNextKey (replace the old method)

public int getNextKey() { return 0; }

Read full topic
